name: Medieval Siege Emporium
description:
MEDIEVAL SIEGE EMPORIUM

**THIS IS AN INCOMPLETE PROTOTYPE. ANY FEEDBACK IS VERY MUCH APPRECIATED**

In Medieval Siege Emporium, you take control of a retail store in the Middle Ages specializing in siege equipment. Manage your store, guide your employees and keep everything from falling apart!

Controls: 

-Move staff: Select staff member by clicking, then click to move them to an area. Staff will automatically interact with any tasks you move them to.

-Open the Ledger on the bottom left corner of the screen to access hiring/firing of staff, stock purchasing and store upgrades
